newsitem.title: UK: SIG buys remaining 50 pct stake in Golinski.
newsitem.headline: SIG buys remaining 50 pct stake in Golinski.

text.p: SIG said it exercised its option to buy the remaining 50 percent stake not already owned in Germany's Golinski Group for 27 million marks.
SIG, a distributor of insulation products, bought the first 50 percent in Golinski in March.
"Since acquisition, we have been encouraged by the sales performances shown," said SIG chief executive Bill Forrester.
